open.title: Metrofibre Outage | Serengeti Sands
open.description: Please note users on the Metrofibre network in Serengeti Sands will experience limited to no connectivity due to an outage. Metrofibre engineers are attending to the fault. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Netstream Outage | Stonewood Estate, Summit View Estate & Coral Wood Village
open.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity affecting client on the Netstream network. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: We are still working deligiently with Netstream to find and resolve the cause of no connectivity.
